drbeqvh_NA3Xk/W_52.title: Polymorph
drbeqvh_NA3Xk/W_52.richdesc:
Welcome to Polymorph!

Polymorph is a web workspace. 
Polymorph renders a set of items that describe both its form and function. This means each polymorph document (including this one!) can be adjusted as necessary. Try dragging the edges of this container (or hold shift).

drbeqvh_NA3YYZP_53.title: Hugo
drbeqvh_NA3YYZP_53.richdesc:
Hugo

Hugo is a meeting notes software. It is designed to be a one stop shop for taking meeting notes, then following through with them. 

As such, it prides itself on its integrations with slack, trello, asana, salesforce, jira, zendesk, hubspot and more. 

The workflow for Hugo is typically:
- Setup
1. Pick integrations
- Pre-meeting
1. Get reminder to create agenda
2. Create agenda using agenda updates. 
3. HUGO sends timed reminders.
- During meeting
1. Take meeting notes; focusing on action items.
2. Use guidance to assign action items.
- Post meeting
1. HUGO shuttles meeting into the required organisations
2. HUGO notifies everyone that needs to be notified.
- Anytime:
1. Check upcoming meetings
2. Search for past meetings, people, companies, groups, teammates, tags, text

Compared to polymorph, there is:
- a greater emphasis on teaching and structured organisation
- a greater emphasis on distributed alerts and teamwork

Polymorph, however, has:
- No server requirements - everything is local
- A more flexible UX.
